MS MCQs

    Get started with AI Builder document automation

    »

    1. Which scenario can the Document automation base kit address?

      Invoice automation

      Purchase order automation

      Receipt automation

      All of the above


    2. Which licenses are required?

      Power PBI

      Power Apps, Power Automate, and AI Builder

      Power Automate Robotic Process Automation

      Dynamics 365


    3. What document formats are supported?

      GIF, DOCX, and JPEG

      JPEG, PNG, and PDF

      All images and document formats


    4. Can this reference implementation be customized to fit my business?

      No, it is already pre-configured to fit all needs.

      Yes, using the low code capabilities of the Platform.

      It offers enough flexibility by default to adapt to your business specifics but can be extended as appropriate.


    5. What personas are enabled by this implementation and what is their role?

      A manual reviewer who reviews the extracted data and a process owner who monitors the pipeline

      An administrator who installs, configures, and runs the process

      There is no role support, so all users can access the full range of features
